# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    line = ""
    lines = String[]

    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = String(word)
        else
            line *= word * " "
        end
    end

    push!(lines, line)
    join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example
wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam dapibus, tellus eu faucibus commodo, mi quam ullamcorper nibh, vel aliquet nisi nisi eu nibh. Nam eget massa quis mauris tristique congue.")
```

Output:

```julia "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
 consectetur adipiscing elit.
 Etiam dapibus, tellus eu faucibus commodo,
 mi quam ullamcorper nibh,
 vel aliquet nisi nisi eu nibh.
 Nam eget massa quis mauris tristique congue."
```
